page.title: 07Communications
page.content: There is a lack of{communications}as the vast majority of this area has no bus service at all.People have to travel out of the block to find any form of public{transport. }Because of this,a high proportion of families who reside in this area run their own car.For those who do not rural isolation is an acute problem affecting their{life styles} especially, during the winter months.School children from the Lexhams are bussed daily,into and out of Litcham which is the{education } centre for the Lexhams.Those from the edge of Great Dunham are near enough to walk to their primary school,or catch a school bus to Litcham High School.
